title: Understanding Querying
text: Querying is a process used in databases and spreadsheets to filter and retrieve specific data based on certain criteria.

title: Filter Criteria
text: Filter criteria are the conditions or rules that determine which data is selected or displayed when querying a table.

hintAnswer: the process of filtering activity based on one or more filter criteria
title: Identifying the Correct Definition
text: Which of the following best describes querying?
choices: the process of filtering activity based on one or more filter criteria
a logical rule by which data is tested and chosen
a method of sorting like ascending and descending, but alphabetical
